tool_description: Generates professional content for specific document sections using provided outlines, maintaining appropriate business tone and style.

section_title.description: Title of the section to write

tone_requirement.description: Required writing tone: formal, persuasive, analytical, or informative

word_count_target.description: Target word count for the section (50-2000)

include_data_points.description: Whether to include placeholder data points and statistics

error_messages: Invalid tone requirement: Use one of [formal, persuasive, analytical, informative]
Word count out of range: Target must be between 50 and 2000 words
Empty section outline: Provide at least one outline point for content generation
Too many outline points: Maximum 10 points allowed per section
usage: Specify section_title, section_outline, tone_requirement, and word_count_target to generate section content. Enable include_data_points for data-driven sections.

section_content.description: Generated content for the specified section

actual_word_count.description: Actual word count of generated content
